Education

Professional Experience

  • Intern, Statistics Research Department at AT&T Labs Summer 2013
    • I’ll be working under the direction of Kenny Shirley & Chris Volinsky

  • Graduate Teaching Assistant, Iowa State University Aug. 2011 - May 2013
    • Course instructor for Intro to Business Statistics. (Fall & Spring 2012)
    • Teaching Assistant for Statistical Methods for Research Workers. (Summer 2012)
    • Grading supervisor for Intro to Business Statistics. (2011)

  • Data Analyst, Hardwick-Day Inc. Nov. 2010 - Nov. 2011
    • Developed an algorithm for the company’s web-based Net Price Calculators (projected to generate over $3M in new revenue over five years).

Computational Skills
